statements: DELETE FROM UserIdentityVerification WHERE verification_code = '123456' AND phone_number = '555-1234';
DELETE FROM UserVerification WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM Users u JOIN UserVerification uv ON u.user_id = uv.user_id WHERE u.username = 'jane_smith';
DELETE FROM UserInformation WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = 5 AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserAuthentications WHERE user_id = 3 AND login_time < '2022-05-01' AND logout_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM user_profile WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM user_identification WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE email = 'jane@example.com');
